description:
Contents:

- "Relunea Glasses" Hunter layered armor piece

The gilded ornamentation on these half-rimmed glasses creates an intellectual yet elegant look.

Hunt in style with this special layered armor!

- Hunter Layered Armor can be used in the Layered Armor Settings menu of the Item Box.
- This item can be equipped to your hunterâ€™s head.
- Layered armor is a "skin" which changes the appearance of the character without affecting their stats and abilities.
name: "Relunea Glasses" Hunter layered armor piece
